summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4455 for the improvement of West Fontanelle Street, from Fauntleroy Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52569, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
